TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(object sender, SourceChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SourceChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SourceChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SourceChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SourceChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type SourceChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SourceChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: Objeto donde se generó el evento y en el que está asociado el controlador de eventos.

span.span: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento "SourceChanged" en elementos específicos del agente de escucha.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El evento "SourceChanged" que este delegado representa los controladores para no se expone como pública [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] eventos, como sucede con los eventos enrutados más.The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events. En su lugar, "SourceChanged" es un evento enrutado que sigan siendo privado en el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infraestructura y se enruta directamente.Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed. Porque es directo enruta, `sender` y en el evento datos son siempre el mismo objeto.Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the in the event data are always the same object. Puede agregar y quitar controladores a este evento a pesar de que el nivel de acceso privado del propio evento mediante el uso de los métodos públicos y .You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods and . El `sender` del evento será una clase derivada de .The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of .
